title: Gingerbread pancakes with Parma ham and maple syrup
description: Major brownie points are awarded to those who go the extra mile on a Sunday and rustle up this breakfast dish. If you prefer to have the pancakes plain, then just omit the cinnamon, ground ginger, lemon zest, vanilla and sugar.
ingredients: ½ vanilla pod, or a couple of drops of vanilla extract (optional)
100ml/3½fl oz sour cream or crème fraîche
